cast.overview: Two seemingly unconnected souls from different corners of the United States make a telepathic bond that allows them to see, hear and feel the other's experiences, creating a bond that apparently can't be broken.
cast.title: In Your Eyes

details.biography: David Gallagher (born February 9, 1985) is an American actor. He is best known for the role of Simon Camden on 7th Heaven and Mikey Ubriacco in the Look Who's Talking Now. He also voices Riku in the Kingdom Hearts video game series.
details.name: David Gallagher
details.place_of_birth: New York City, New York, USA
